Jamie Singleton
Data Scientist About Me Web Developer
Kaggle - Ames House Prices
This project utilized linear regression and ensembling to predict house prices in Ames, Iowa. The Kaggle competition provided the datasets and problem definition. Several data manipulation steps were required to increase prediction accuracy.

Data Scientist
Data science can be thought of as the interestion of computer science, math and statistics, and business/domain knowledge.

I create and implement powerful predictive models through using scikit-learn and TensorFlow machine learning libraries. Data visualization software such as matplotlib, Plotly, and Tableau help aid in presenting data science findings to a non-technical audience.
What I'm Using
  • Python
  • pandas, SQL, Postgres
  • matplotlib, Plotly, Tableau
  • scikit-learn, TensorFlow, Keras
  • Linux, AWS EC2, Git
What I'm Learning
  • scrapy, Hadoop, Spark, Kafka
Learning Path

  • Coursera Course - deeplearning.ai's 'Improving Deep Neural Networks: Hyperparameter tuning, Regularization and Optimization'
  • Coursera Course - deeplearning.ai's 'Structuring Machine Learning Projects'
  • Coursera Course - deeplearning.ai's 'Convolutional Neural Networks'
  • Coursera Course - deeplearning.ai's 'Sequence Models'
